entry.title: OEMConfig 2.9.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Support of new device features
    • Good Read Overlay (on-screen scan notification)
    • Snap OCR (document scanning)
    • Pocket-Mode (power savings)
  • New scanning settings
    • Good Read notification tones
    • Visual Formatting enable
  • New keyboard remapping options
    • Push-To-Talk key
    • OCR decoding trigger
  • Added missing support for WWAN properties
    • Preferred Network Type
    • MCC, MNC
    • MVNO type and value

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Corrected potential crash when run on older devices (Android 8.1).
  • Key Remapping settings applied from a JSON file with an EMM/MDM get deleted after OEMConfig applies its settings.
    • Clearing of key remapping settings is now controled with the "Reset key remapping" setting when applied with an EMM/MDM.
  • Unable to set the device name to use the Short MAC Address.

entry.title: QuickBoard 1.0.0
entry.summary: QuickBoard is now available. It is an Android IME that allows the user to customize the on screen keyboard. It also allows them to scan from the custom keyboard. You can access the documentation here.
entry.content:
QuickBoard is now available. It is an Android IME that allows the user to customize the on screen keyboard. It also allows them to scan from the custom keyboard. You can access the documentation here.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the QuickBoard Github page.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.4.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

QuickBoard âœ¨â€‹

  • Visual editor for designing customized virtual keyboards for Datalogic devices
  • Can be utilized on devices running Android 11 and above

Key Remapping âœ¨â€‹

  • Provides configuration options for the Datalogic Keyboard Mapper
  • Enables the ability to reassign physical buttons to display different keys, output strings of text, launch intents, and perform advanced script actions

Miscellaneousâ€‹

  • Added option for removing all existing application policies on device (ðŸ“Œrequires Agent v2.3.0 or later)
  • Added basic proxy support for Studio updates and APK downloads
  • Changed Host Files profile behavior to not enable all Device and Scanner settings by default
  • Added Visual Formatter level 5 support
  • Added Routines option to change which Visual Formatter is active with Application Policies
  • UI improvements for Advanced Keyboard page
  • Other minor UI improvements and fixes
  • Improved download speed of main application updates

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed an issue that prevented the use of uploaded files within script commands
  • Advanced Keyboard
    • Android 13 devices now start with version 2 selected by default
    • Made PTT availability more clear
  • Fixed SIM/AKA/AKA-PRIME appearing as options for EAP networks on WLAN only devices
  • Fixed an issue where invalid server hosting controls could prevent profile save even when not hosting files

entry.title: CODiScan - Aladdin 3.2.9
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.2.9 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.2.9 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Various improvements to BT connection stability

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.8.3
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Additional scanning properties
    • Transmit data as hex string
    • Enable internal/external scanner
    • Wedge Intent IDs
  • Enhanced wakeup trigger behavior
  • Enhanced LED settings
  • Enhanced support for Bluetooth pairing with Datalogic devices
  • Enhanced support of network/connections controls
  • Added support for new display settings
    • Desktop mode
    • Upside down rotation
    • Screenshot capture
  • Added support for new keyboard settings
    • Physical keyboard
    • Virtual keyboard
  • Added support for User Interface controls
    • Notifications
    • Block system controls
    • Show system features
  • Added support for Virtual RAM

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.4.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Better coordination with Espresso when staging from "Hi There" screen.
  • Supports explicit broadcast intents to packages without component name.
  • Extended intent support for silent deploy
    • Added extra argument to supply QR code input from a JSON file.
  • Enhanced profile logging
    • Creates log history of previous profile sessions.
    • Log history is stored in Downloads folder for access by EMM/MDMs.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Corrected support for large (> 2 GB) file downloads.
  • Corrected support for SFTP downloads.
  • Corrected handling of OTA reset options.
  • Corrected BATTERY_OPTIMIZATION script command to run on devices with Android 13.

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.5.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Support launching Web sites from NFC tags

entry.title: Datalogic Launcher 1.3.0
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Wallpaper size support for Stretch to Crop and Fill
  • New variables for use in title bar
    • IP Address for both Wi-Fi and Ethernet networks
  • Additional lock-down abilities
    • Allow launching Web sites from NFC tags
    • Allow self-update of apps
    • Allow use with an external display

entry.title: Datalogic Logger 1.3.1
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added support for network packet logging.
  • Added support for System on Chip diagnostic logging.

entry.title: Datalogic SoftSpot 3.1.0
entry.content:
Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Corrected range of spot position on external displays

entry.title: CODiScan - Aladdin 3.2.4
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.2.4 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.2.4 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added new intent that can cause a pairing barcode to be displayed.
  • Pairing dialogs no longer come up when run on Datalogic devices with SDK 1.36 or newer.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed issue with pairing to being lost on battery swap.
  • Fixed issue with pairing to being lost on reboot.
  • Fixed issue with pairing barcode sometimes being invalid.
  • Fixed issue with connect button sometimes not being displayed.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.1
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.1 is now available. It includes minor enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.1 is now available. It includes minor enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added support for Android 13 versions of Skorpio X5, XLR Skorpio X5, Memor 11, and Memor 20.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed bug with application policies that could cause a new policy not to be added.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Added Routines to the Application Policies section
  • Added pop up menu to the task tray that allows for port configuration
  • Updated icons for Datalogic apps within the Mobility Suite Updates section
  • Updated Memor 35 firmware metadata
  • Added ENABLE_APP and DISABLE_APP to the Scripts page
  • Added key sequences and new BATTSWAP keycode to the Advanced Keyboard
  • Improved layouts of the Visual Formatter

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • Fixed an issue where it was possible to create a tar file with multiple OTA files in it

entry.title: Datalogic WiFi Guard 1.4.0

Enhancementsâ€‹

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.4.2
entry.content:
Enhancementsâ€‹

  • Improved security handling
    • Blocks connections with SSL errors, adding an option to proceed anyway.
    • Allows user to select a certificate when a web server requires a client certificate.
  • Improved clear browser cache management
    • Added option to clear browser cache when the Home button is selected.
    • Prevents access to previous webpage from Favorites screen after clearing the cache.

Corrected Defectsâ€‹

  • On-screen keyboard no longer covers up web page content.
